1682630.name: Big Boy Boxing Demo
1682630.description:
Current state of the demo:

  • 7 bosses of out 15
  • Perks and abilities: WIP and not part of the demo
  • Rematch powered-up version of previous bosses: WIP and not part of the demo
  • Campaign mode: WIP and not part of the demo
  • Classical arcade mode: WIP and not part of the demo
  • Endless survival mode: WIP and not part of the demo
  • Roguelite mode inspiried by Last of Us: Part 2 No Return Mode: WIP and not part of the demo
  • Mod support: TBD

If you have any questions, join our
1682630.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
